text: Nau hehethee jedauwuu hadnauchuhanehede nau hadnenehede, Jevajanethajuhu: dajanau wauwu haugauhude, nau nanesaunauau nanejauwu naudauvaa;11.7 Mid-verse punctuation could be either a colon or semicolon as the lower part of the punctuation is malformed. It was decided to use the semicolon, in line with the KJV, as the punctuation of the two texts often coincides. nananenau nÄhauwuneethauwauthe nau hajeneevenathane.
